title: DOJ probe into Powell sparks backlash from some Republicans, former Fed chairs
full_text: DOJ probe into Powell sparks backlash from some Republicans, former Fed chairs. A bipartisan group of top economic officials called the DOJ probe into Jerome Powell an "unprecedented attempt" to undermine the Fed's independence.. The Justice Department investigation into Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell is sparking backlash from former Federal Reserve and Treasury officials as well as current members of Congress, includ… [+4469 chars]
